Text: Oh-woof...

Oh? You look unhappy. Is there something you want
to say?
...I like you, Lady Alpha.
Thank you.

But...I hate these clothes you told me to wear!
They're frilly and hard to move in! I can't do
my mission!

No. That attire of yours is essential for your
mission. This is for you to practice...going
undercover.

Going undercover? I don't need to do that! I'll just
do a ton of fighting!

True, you specialize in combat. However, when faced
with unexpected situations, it's essential to have
skills to adapt.
Oh-woof... But it's such a hassle...

No need to get down. As your attire suggests,
you'll be infiltrating is a school.

It's a place where people of our age gather...
Someday, you might infiltrate the school
Shadow goes to.
Where Boss man goes to...?!

If I get better at going undercover, can I see Boss
man more?!

...Well, I won't deny it may happen. Now that you're
interested, let's start immediately.

Blending in is essential when infiltrating. You'll be
gathering intel, so no rampaging and, of course,
no hunting.
What?! No hunting?!

I told you, blending in is essential. Any actions
that would draw attention to you are strictly
prohibited.

Also, assume there are various types of individuals
at school. Sometimes, you will have to deal with
difficult people. Be patient and gather intel.
Difficult people... Hmm...
Eta! Wake up!
Ugh... What? I was just starting to doze off...
Gimme intel!
I'm sleepy...
Don't sleep! Hand over the intel to me!
Pipe down... Zzz...
Eta! Wake up!!!

Ha-ruff... Talking to difficult people seems
tough...

But...I won't give up on going undercover! I'll do
my best to meet Boss man!
Hehe, you seem fired up. Good for you, Delta.
Eheheh!

But it takes more than that to successfully
infiltrate somewhere. It's important to control
yourself.

Unexpected issues often arise when infiltrating.
Sometimes, you might confront troublemakers.
Don't fall for their provocations.
Provo-what-uns...? Who's gonna do that
Well, if it isn't the stupid mutt!
Grr...
Think a dumb doggie like you can keep up in class?
What did you say?! You
(No! I can't fall for her provoca-whatevers!)

Hmph! No time to deal with you, kitty cat!
Outta my way!

Heh, too bad. And here I was thinking of sharing
intel with you.
Intel?! What is it?!
Heheh. Well...

If you spin around three times and bark, maybe I'll
tell you.
Grrr! I can't stand it anymore! She's so annoying!
Um, Delta? What's got into you all of a sudden?

It's her fault for provo-catting me! Serves her right if
she gets knocked out!

I'm not sure what you're talking about...but it
sounds like you're not quite ready for infiltration
missions yet...
That kitty cat...! I'll never forgive her!
